New Friends

#clientswork #illustration

Collaboration with @berbagisedikit. I was asked to choose 2 of some human traits to illustrate with a specific composition: hand in the middle of some certain size. The illustrations will be used as a reward for donors/contributors of the organization. I chose to draw the keywords “friendly” and “understanding”. Here’s my attempt:
